mapper.insert:

insert into floating_population (name, name_used_before, sex, photo, id_card, fixed_phone, household_city_code, phone, nation_id, come_time, education_level_id, political_outlook_id, faith_id, height, weight, blood_type_id, healthy, disability_code, employment_state_id, marital_state_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified,check_reason_id,company_id ) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameUsedBefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fixedPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{householdCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comeTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{educationLevelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{politicalOutlookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{faithId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bloodTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{healthy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{disabilityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employmentStateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maritalStateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checkReasonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update floating_population
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name_used_before = #{nameUsedBefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT},
id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=CHAR},
fixed_phone = #{fixedPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
household_city_code = #{householdCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR},
nation_id = #{nationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
come_time = #{comeTime,jdbcType=DATE},
education_level_id = #{educationLevelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
political_outlook_id = #{politicalOutlookId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
faith_id = #{faithId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
height = #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
blood_type_id = #{bloodTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
healthy = #{healthy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
disability_code = #{disabilityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employment_state_id = #{employmentStateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
marital_state_id = #{maritalStateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT},
state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_checked = #{isChecked,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update floating_population set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_used_before = #{nameUsedBefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=CHAR}, fixed_phone = #{fixedPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, household_city_code = #{householdCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, nation_id = #{nationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, come_time = #{comeTime,jdbcType=DATE}, education_level_id = #{educationLevelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, political_outlook_id = #{politicalOutlookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, faith_id = #{faithId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, height = #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, blood_type_id = #{bloodTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, healthy = #{healthy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, disability_code = #{disabilityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employment_state_id = #{employmentStateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, marital_state_id = #{maritalStateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_checked = #{isChecked,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT f.id,f.`name`,f.phone,f.gmt_create FROM floating_population as f WHERE is_checked=#{stateCode} and f.company_id=#{unitId}
SELECT f.id,f.`name`,f.phone,f.gmt_create FROM floating_population as f WHERE is_checked=2102
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM floating_population as f WHERE is_checked=2101 and f.company_id=#{unitId}
